title: Steps for a PR
content:
# Steps for a PR

1. Write tests for whatever you've coded up
2. Remove all debugging code (`Rg print`)
2. Even better `git diff | grep "+.*print"`
3. Remove unused imports
4. Watch for test files, test models, etc.
5. look for TODOs you've created
6. Comment confusing parts of the code
7. `git add -p` for incremental add
